org.gvsig.fmap.swing.toc

Interface TOC

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PortableViewToc
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPortableViewToc

    public interface TOC
extends Service
    This interface must be implemented by future TOC implementations. This is used following the Tools scheme (services, managers, etc)
    See Also:
    DefaultToc

        getManager

    • Method Detail

      • getParameters

        DynObject getParameters()
        Gets the parameters that were used to instantiate this TOC. Normally, the @see MapContext
        Returns:
        a dynobject containing the parameters

      • getFactory

        TOCFactory getFactory()
        Returns:
        the TOCFactory that created this TOC.

      • getComponent

        JComponent getComponent()
        Returns:
        the Swing component that represents this TOC (for example a JTree or a JPanel with a JTree in it)

      • getMapContext

        MapContext getMapContext()
        Returns:
        the MapContext on which this TOC is necessarily based

      • showAll

        void showAll()
        Expands fully the graphic representation of the TOC (for example, expands all the nodes to show all layer details)

      • hideAll

        void hideAll()
        Hides as much as possible the graphic representation of the TOC (for example, collapses all the nodes to hide all layer details except the list of layers itself)

      • showAllLegends

        void showAllLegends()
        Expands all graphic representation of layer legends

      • hideAllLegends

        void hideAllLegends()
        Collapses all graphic representation of layer legends

      • show

        void show(FLayer lyr,
          boolean detailed)
        Makes the name and representation of a certain layer visible in the TOC. For example, the TOC might be a JTree inside a scroll pane. This method would scroll down the scroll pane to let the user see the layer is listed
        Parameters:
        lyr - the layer whose name and details must be made visible
        detailed - whether the layer details must be shown or not

      • showLegend

        void showLegend(FLayer lyr)
        Makes layer legend details visible
        Parameters:
        lyr - layer whose legend details must be shown

      • hideLegend

        void hideLegend(FLayer lyr)
        Makes layer legend details not visible
        Parameters:
        lyr - layer whose legend details must be hidden

      • selectLayer

        void selectLayer(FLayer lyr)
        Add a layer to the set of selected layers
        Parameters:
        lyr - layer which must be selected (not exclusively)

      • unselectLayer

        void unselectLayer(FLayer lyr)
        Removes a layer from the set of selected layers
        Parameters:
        lyr - layer which must be unselected

      • clearSelection

        void clearSelection()
        Clears current layer selection

      • getSelectedLayers

        FLayer[] getSelectedLayers()
        Returns:
        array of selected layers

      • setActiveLayer

        void setActiveLayer(FLayer lyr)
        Sets a layer as active (exclusively: the number of active layers must be 0 or 1)
        Parameters:
        lyr - layer to be set as active or null to have 0 layers active

      • getActiveLayer

        FLayer getActiveLayer()
        Returns:
        the currently active layer or null if no layer is active

      • invokeAction

        void invokeAction(FLayer lyr,
                  String action)
        Invokes a certain action on a certain layer
        Parameters:
        lyr - the layer on which the action will be performed
        action - the action to be performed

      • addLegendActionListener

        void addLegendActionListener(LegendActionEventListener lel)
        Adds a legend action listener. These listeners will be notified when the user shows interest in a legend symbol (typically double click)
        Parameters:
        lel - new legend action listener

      • removeLegendActionListener

        void removeLegendActionListener(LegendActionEventListener lel)
        Removes a legend action listener
        Parameters:
        lel - legend action listener to be removed

      • addLayerActionListener

        void addLayerActionListener(LayerActionEventListener lel)
        Adds a layer action listener. These listeners will be notified when the user shows interest in a layer (typically double click)
        Parameters:
        lel - new layer action listener

      • removeLayerActionListener

        void removeLayerActionListener(LayerActionEventListener lel)
        Removes a layer action listener
        Parameters:
        lel - layer action listener to be removed

      • addActiveLayerChangeListener

        void addActiveLayerChangeListener(ActiveLayerChangeEventListener alcel)
        Adds a active layer change listener. These listeners will be notified when a new layer is set as active
        Parameters:
        alcel - new active layer change listener

      • removeActiveLayerChangeListener

        void removeActiveLayerChangeListener(ActiveLayerChangeEventListener alcel)
        Removes a active layer change listener
        Parameters:
        alcel - active layer change listener to be removed
